nodes.text: The Numatra system was a star system located within the galactic regions known as the Core Worlds and the Southern Core. It was home to the creatures known as numatras, as well as the origin point of Numatra snakehide.
The Numatra system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-12.
